column2: "Iyinom ekyir no
column3: Jesus yii noho kyerɛɛ n'esuafo wɔ Tiberias po ho; na mbrɛ oyii noho kyerɛe nye yi."

column2: "Simon Peter nye Tomas a wɔfrɛ no Ata nye Nataniel a ofi Kana a ɔwɔ Galilii
column3: nye Zebedee ne mba no nye esuafo no mu beenu so wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Simon Peter see hɔn dɛ
column3: Morokɔ po. Wɔsee no dɛ
column4: Hɛn so yɛnye wo bɔkɔ. Na wopuei kɔr hɛn mu; naaso dɛm anadwe no woennya hwee."

column2: "Na adze rekye no Jesus begyinaa mpoano
column3: naaso nna esuafo no nnyim dɛ Jesus a."

column2: "Na Jesus bisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Enuanom
column4: ana hom enya nam bi?  Wobuaa no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom ntow eboa no ngu hɛn no ne nyimfa na hom benya bi.  Na wogui
column4: na nam no dodow ntsi woenntum anntwetwe."

column2: "Na osuanyi a Jesus dɔɔ no no see Peter dɛ
column3: Ewuradze a! Na Simon Peter tsee dɛ ɔyɛ Ewuradze no
column4: ɔdze no sortar kyekyeer noho (nna odzi adagyaw) na ɔtoow no ho kyeen po no mu."

column2: "Na esuafo nkaa no nam hɛn kakraba mu bae (nna wɔnye famu ntamu nnwar
column3: ɔbɛyɛ basafa ahaenu) na wɔtwetwee eboa no nye nam no."

column2: "Na wofii hɛn no mu siaan famu no
column3: wohun ngyansenama a nam gu do nye paanoo."

column2: "Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mfa nam a hom nyaa no sesei no bi mbra."

column2: "Na Simon Peter kɔree kɔtwetwee eboa no baa daadze
column3: nam akɛse ma
column5: naaso wɔdɔɔ so dɛm mpo a

column2: "Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mbɛka hom ano.  Esuafo no mu biara enntum emmbisa no dɛ
column4: Woana nye wo; osiandɛ nna wonyim dɛ Ewuradze a."

column2: "Jesus bae bɛfaa paanoo no maa hɔn
column3: ɔnye nam no so dɛmara."

column2: "Iyi nye ne mpɛn ebiasa a Jesus soɛree fii ewufo mu ekyir no
column3: oyii noho kyerɛɛ n'esuafo."

column2: "Na wɔkaa hɔn ano wiei no
column3: Jesus bisaa Simon Peter dɛ
column6: ana edɔ me sen iyinom?  Ɔsee no dɛ
column9: woara inyim dɛ modɔ wo. Jesus see no dɛ

column2: "Ɔsee no mpɛn ebien dɛ
column3: Simon
column5: ana edɔ me?  Ɔsee no dɛ
column8: woara inyim dɛ modɔ wo. Ɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Ɔsee no bio ne mpɛn ebiasa dɛ
column3: Simon
column5: ana edɔ me?  Ɔyɛɛ Peter awerɛhow dɛ ɔsee no mpɛn ebiasa dɛ
column6: Ana edɔ me? Na ɔsee no dɛ
column8: woara inyim adze nyina: inyim dɛ modɔ wo. Jesus see no dɛ

column2: "Meka no nokwar mu kyerɛ wo dɛ
column3: eyɛ aberantsɛ no
column5: na enantseew mbrɛ woara epɛ; na sɛ inya yɛ akɔdaa a
column6: ebɛtsen wo nsa na obi abɔ wo do na ɔdze wo akɔ mbrɛ emmpɛ."

column2: "Na ɔkaa yi no
column3: ɔdze kyerɛɛ owu kor a ɔdze rebɛhyɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam. Na ɔkaa yi no

column2: "Na Peter daan noho no
column3: ohun osuanyi a Jesus dɔ no no dɛ odzi n'ekyir
column4: ɔno so na ɔtweer no bo mu wɔ edzidziase na obisaa dɛ
column6: nyia oriyi wo ama no nye woana no?"

column2: "Ɔno na Peter hun no no ɔsee Jesus dɛ
column3: Ewuradze

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ mepɛ dɛ ɔtsena hɔ kodu dɛ mebɛba a
column4: ɔfa wo ho bɛn? Ɔwo dze

column2: "Na asɛm yi tahyee wɔ enuanom no mu dɛ osuanyi yi runnwu: naaso Jesus annse no dɛ orunnwu
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Sɛ mepɛ dɛ ɔtsena hɔ kodu dɛ mebɛba a

column2: "Oyi nye osuanyi a odzi yinom ho dase
column3: na ɔkyerɛɛw iyinom no
column4: na yenyim dɛ ne dasee yɛ nokwar."

column2: "Na ndzɛmba pii so wɔ hɔ a Jesus yɛe a
column3: sɛ wɔrekyerɛw ne nyina nkorkor a
column4: nkyɛ mohwɛ a nwoma a wɔbɛkyerɛw no ronnkɔ wiadze mu mpo."
